name: Warriorb
detailed_description:
Being summoned to another world and forced into a physical body is never a pleasant experience. The fact that you find yourself imprisoned inside a ball does not help the situation, either. Using your enthralling powers you manage to shape the body into a better form – having two limbs is better than having none after all, right? You also create a pair of eyes to have a better look at your situation – it is even worse than you expected. Not remembering anything from your previous life might be a blessing at this point.

Are you ready to face whatever stands between you and your freedom?

  • Explore a once-flourishing world before the decay prevails
  • Bounce and roll your way towards freedom
  • Avoid traps – they won’t avoid you
  • Talk to the inhabitants – you will need all the help you can get
  • Fight your way out of the unpleasant situations
  • Solve puzzles – they can’t be that complicated, right?
  • Gather new weapons, clothes and trinkets

short_description: Warriorb is a challenging spline-scroller platformer game. You play as a mighty spirit trapped in an unlikely body. Will you be able to regain your freedom?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are Not Yet final requirements. Future changes are very likely.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (64bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: These are Not Yet final requirements. Future changes are very likely.
